WHEELIE shook his head, =
"I'm told that CYCLONUS was here, but if he's around I haven't seen him nea=
r.  Neither him nor Scourge are about, they seem to be doing without."

Sig=
hing, and elaborating, "As for what's up wtih GRIMLOCK, I don't think any c=
an say or say not.  HE and the rest of his DINOBOTS are about, but no one k=
nows for sure or without.  They seem to be smashing around, driving everyon=
e into the ground.  They say there's some sort of prison ship, under attack=
 by someone named MAGMATRON and SABERBACK after a clip.  I'm not sure what'=
s going on, but something is heavily wrong.  GRIMLOCK is after other MAXIMA=
LS, and something pains me to say so, but he seems enraged from the get-go.=

are in no way ready to go, so we must say here for now and we both know."
